```{r load-packages}
library(rfishbase)
eco <- ecosystem()
caspian_species <- unique(eco$Species[eco$EcosystemName == "Caspian Sea"])
caspian_species <- gsub(" ", "_", gbr_species, fixed = TRUE)
full_phylo <- fishtree_phylogeny()
caspian_phy <- fishtree_phylogeny(caspian_species)
mrca_node <- ape::getMRCA(full_phylo, caspian_phy$tip.label)
pruned_phy <- ape::extract.clade(full_phylo, mrca_node)


library(fishtree)
```
